yes running that cow deskelet
how do you do that ?
`apt-get install gdesklets && apt-get install gdesklets-data'
you may have to update your repos first though.
yea I mean, after installing.. how do you run the displays..
`cd /usr/share/gdesklets/Displays'
'ls' and 'cd' to whichever desklets you wanna run.
Then run gdesklets and give it the name of the display as an argument. For instance 'gdesklets debian-cow.display'
good luck, there isn't much documentation for this piece of software.
oh and after you've done that 'gdeskelet desklet.display' run gdesklet so it will appear on your desktop.
